name: Event Horizon (itch) (jmefford17)
description:
The story takes place in the Big Bang period, each galactic god uses various types of planets to create their own galaxy. The player will play the role of the god of the Milky Way and will use the planets of the Milky Way to fight against the other gods who want to invade.

This game was created as a group project for our game design class.
